The bizantine fault-tolerance model: systems might keep working even some components conspire against it, Fred Schneider #ICSE2010 keynote
The bizantine model is not for attacks prevention (systems running the same software have the same vulnerability), Fred Schneider #ICSE2010
SOS stands for Science Of Security, Fred Schneider #ICSE2010 keynote
.	Science (for comp):  body of knowledge gained through research; For engineering: Craft informed by Science, Fred Schneider #ICSE2010
Obfuscation  generates different program that might turn an attack into a crash (does not address availability), Fred Schneider #ICSE2010
Type checking is a form of Defense (more or less addressing the same attacks that obfuscation does), Fred Schneider #ICSE2010 keynote
Confidentiality attack: flow of (secret) information goes to the attacker instead of the user, Fred Schneider #ICSE2010 keynote
Integrity attack: the attacker provides untrusted input as it was trusted, Fred Schneider #ICSE2010 keynote
In natural sciences, experiments validate laws with unknown reality, Fred Schneider #ICSE2010 keynote
In computer science, experiments make measures to learn about complex realities, or prototyping to validate assumptions, Schneider #ICSE2010
